text: Ravier is a French surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Daniel Ravier (born 1948), French football player *Gustave Ravier (1850–1918), French politician *Guy Ravier (born 1937), French politician *Jean-Christophe Ravier (born 1979), French racing driver *Stéphane Ravier (born 1969), French politician Category:French-language surnames
title: Ravier
